About Me

Little story about Yuan...

Yuan is currently studying in Rochester Institute of Technology as a graduate student majoring in visual communication design . Before she steps into this field, she obtained a master degree in medical science. She regards herself as a generalist because of her broad experience in arts, academic and industry. She realized her career goal as a designer because design makes her full of passion and happiness, allowing her to be more relatable to other people and surroundings.

She strives to use her sympathy and product vision to create a harmonious and enduring relatioship between human and environments.
